sentences.en: a warning that grey squirrels are threatening the existence of red squirrels
sentences.cn: 关于灰松鼠正威胁到红松鼠生存的警告

sentences.en: an early warning of heart disease
At intervals there were red warning lights.
sentences.cn: 红色警示灯一明一灭地闪着。

sentences.en: Doctors issued a warning against eating any fish caught in the river.
sentences.cn: 医生发出警告不要吃在那条河里捕的鱼。

sentences.en: Garin shot him a dark glance, as if in warning.
sentences.cn: 加林恶狠狠地瞪了他一眼，似乎是在警告。

sentences.en: His soft words contained an undertone of warning.
sentences.cn: 他温和的话中蕴涵着警告之意。

sentences.en: I had this uncanny feeling that Alice was warning me.
sentences.cn: 我有一种奇怪的感觉：艾丽斯是在警告我。

sentences.en: I'm warning you; stop it right now!

sentences.cn: 她忽视了一些预警信号。

sentences.en: Some fog warning signs had been put up with flashing yellow lights.
sentences.cn: 一些配有黄色闪光灯的大雾警示标志立了起来。

sentences.en: Surgeon General's warning: cigarette smoking causes cancer
sentences.cn: 卫生局长提醒大家：吸烟致癌

sentences.en: The driver managed to escape from the vehicle and shout a warning.
sentences.cn: 那名司机设法从车里逃了出来并大声警告别人。

sentences.en: Then without warning, the troops opened fire on the crowd.
sentences.cn: 接着军队未作警示便向人群开了火。

sentences.en: These figures should come with a government health warning.
sentences.cn: 这些数字须附以谨慎对待的警告。

phrases.tran_cn: 预警系统；预先警报系统
预先通知某人(尤指辞职、解雇、退租等)
米兰达警告；米兰达规则
有所警惕；引以为戒；有所警戒
警告等级；警戒水位；报警水平
报警报文；报警信息；警告消息

trans.tran_cn: 警告的;告诫的;引以为戒的
trans.tran_en: a warning action or thing tells you that something bad or dangerous might happen
something, especially a statement, that tells you that something bad, dangerous, or annoying might happen so that you can be ready or avoid it
